sentence.idiomatic: What is his budget?
I do not have a large budget.
Do we have a very large budget this time?
This hotel is located conveniently.
Nowadays it is convenient to get around.
Is it convenient to surf the internet?
He knows this hotel’s location and facilities.
The facilities are fully equipped here.
Do you have shower facilities in your home?
This hotel is in a good location.
My location is not good.
What location are you at now?
It is the off season now.
Business is bad in the off season.
The off season in Shanghai is November and December.
I’ve heard there are many budget hotel chains in Shanghai.
KFC is a restaurant chain.
There are a lot of supermarket chains in Shanghai.
I am going to China next week. Are the hotels there expensive?
That depends on where you are going. Big cities like Beijing and Shanghai are more expensive. What is your budget?
I am going to Shanghai and Hainan. I want to spend about 50 dollars per night. The hotel has to be clean and conveniently located. It would be great if they also have internet connection.

word.literal: not to be able to live

sentence.idiomatic: 50 dollars can get you into a 3-star hotel in downtown Shanghai. It's very cheap to stay in a hotel in Hainan now because it's the off season. 50 dollars can get you a 4 or even 5-star hotel. But you won't get a room with an ocean view.

Really? I've picked the right time to go to Hainan then. I heard there are many budget hotel chains in Shanghai priced at around 200 rmb per night. Do you know anything about their location and facilities?

I stayed in one of those hotels on my last trip to Shanghai. I will give you the reservation number. The one I stayed at is conveniently located and very clean. It also had a wireless internet connection in the room. Many backpackers, even business travelers like it there.
Terrific! That's my pick then. I will use the left over money to upgrade to an ocean view room in Hainan.

word.literal: to make financial accounts work out

sentence.idiomatic: You're quite the accountant!

word.literal: a room with an ocean view
